title: Recharge Data
body: You have used up 90% of your data. Click "Accept" to recharge your data to avoid overage fees

title: Unlimited Facebook
body: We've noticed you have been using Facebook a lot. Click "Accept" to add Unlimited Facebook to your base plan.
snackbar: Unlimited Facebook added to base plan

title: Unlimited Sundays
body: We have noticed you use a lot of data on Sundays. Click "Accept" to add Unlimited Sundays to your base plan.
snackbar: Unlimited Sundays added to base plan

title: We Want to Thank You
body: Being our customer pays off, here is a discount on your base plan this month. Enjoy!

title: Increase Talk Plan
body: You have been recharging your minutes regularly; would you like to increase your base plan by 100 minutes?
